title: Money?
content:
Is it true that you get ₹1000 from uni if you manage to get a 7.5+ GPA in your semester? 
Also, if they did wouldn't the uni go broke lol?

comments.body: Yeah. You get much more too, if you get an even higher GPA.
What if I got SGPA of 2.77?
you get to write your exams once again
You used to get, they stopped after covid. Not sure if it’ll restart anytime soon.
They gave it for our 6th semester (which was a year ago). No news about 7th semester yet
